channel.title: String help

item.title: String help
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

mmk so im trying to display on an interface what type of wilderness you are currently in, but when i log in it comes up as null

heres what i have for the strings

public void WriteWildyLevel()
{
checkwildy2();
if(inwildy2 && !nonWild() && !(absX >= 2372 && absX <=2424  && absY >= 5124 && absY <=5175) && !(absX >= 2816 && absX <=2824  && absY >= 3152 && absY <=3198))
{
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@whi@W@gre@i@whi@l@gre@d @whi@F@gre@F@whi@A", 199);
getwildystatus = "Multi Wild";
leftwild = 1;
}
else if(inwildy2 && !nonWild() && (absX >= 2816 && absX <=2824  && absY >= 3152 && absY <=3198))
{
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@whi@W@gre@i@whi@l@gre@d @whi@1@gre@v@whi@1", 199);
getwildystatus = "1v1 Wild";
leftwild = 1;
}
else if(inwildy2 && !nonWild() && (absX >= 2372 && absX <=2424  && absY >= 5124 && absY <=5175))
{
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@whi@P@gre@i@whi@t@gre@s", 199);
getwildystatus = "Fight Pits";
leftwild = 1;
}
else if(nonWild() && inwildy2 && leftwild == 1)
{
getwildystatus = "Safe Zone";
IsSnowing = 3;
leftwild = 0;
}
}
